alert.note: Alert for Copiah; Franklin; Lincoln (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flash Flood Warning issued January 08 at 10:53PM CST until January 09 at 12:45AM CST by NWS Jackson
info.description: ...FLASH FLOOD WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 1245 AM CST TUESDAY FOR SOUTHEASTERN COPIAH, CENTRAL LINCOLN AND EASTERN FRANKLIN COUNTIES... At 1053 PM CST, emergency management reported thunderstorms producing heavy rain across the warned area. Between 2 and 4 inches of rain have fallen. Flash flooding is already occurring with flooding of roadways reported across the city of Brookhaven as well as surrounding areas. HAZARD...Flash flooding caused by thunderstorms. SOURCE...Emergency management reported. IMPACT...Flash flooding of small creeks and streams, urban areas, highways, streets and underpasses as well as other poor drainage and low-lying areas. Some locations that will experience flash flooding include... Brookhaven, Hazlehurst, Wesson, Beauregard, Loyd Star, Vaughn, West Lincoln, Martinsville, Mccall Creek, Center Point, Little Springs and Rockport. FLASH FLOOD...OBSERVED
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Be especially cautious at night when it is harder to recognize the dangers of flooding.
